channel.title: Kerberos on Cyberstoph's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Kerberos on Cyberstoph's blog

item.title: Abusing Kerberos S4U2self for local privilege escalation
item.description: TL;DR; S4U2self can be abused for local privilege escalation (think: Network Service to Local Admin). This is not something new, it’s just the first time I actually ran through the steps myself so why not write a post about it. The attack is covered briefly in the Rubeus manual and in more detail in this post by Charlie Clark, which I recommend you read. I won’t explain S4U in this post so if you are not familiar with the topic, read this post on constrained delegation first.
